original_title: Dana Carvey: Squatting Monkeys Tell No Lies
overview: As always, Carvey never crosses the line into mean-spiritedness, but easily glides in and out of every impression & expression, reminding us of the huge talent we came to know and love before he left the scene due to his heart condition. It's a bittersweet irony that Dana Carvey is one comic who is ALL heart...
title: Dana Carvey: Squatting Monkeys Tell No Lies
